title: Going for 2016-2018 worlds, Under Team Name: True Fire
body:
This is my smurf, my real acount is level 30, creating a team that should improve this year to get to 2016 and or 2017/2018 worlds, yes I know I need to improve myself but I am ready, looking for  Adc Supp Mid Jungle
Also need subs,  5 subs that can do any role comfortably
Voice chat isn't required

replies.body: Basiclly an hour to 4 hours a day for me

> yes I know I need to improve myself

That's a given, though I'm not one to talk (Silver 3 on my main :S and no idea what I'm doing).

Do you have any idea about when/how often you'd be playing? I *might* be interested.
Leave ign in comments, mine is FuriousFlameDude
